documents.document: @sheilabapat oh, this idea is back? I think I wrote about it a decade ago.

I have not been arrested by anyone in Donald Trump's government.
This tweet will repeat tomorrow if it remains true.
Resistance works. Democrats are learning how to play this game! https://t.co/e5Wul9pZDb

:Opens Twitter:
Sees that it is still bad.
:Closes Twitter:
Congratulations to Atlanta for their Electoral College victory!
@Bencjacobs Wherever you go, it's the same trolls.
That thing where a Supreme Court nominee made up his pro bono work in law school. https://t.co/J6FAIF8Zct
With less than 10 minutes remaining, Atlanta is struggling to overcome New England's commanding lead in the Electoral College.
Jesus and I will never stop tweeting together! https://t.co/mN0ODXev2d
@miri_iron My cynicism and your cynicism should grab a craft beer together. But not an IPA. My cynicism only drinks dark beer.
@BrendanNyhan Yup, but they could have pulled the ads if they though they were a bad business move.
Our president is a monster who could end all life on earth, but at least the crappy watered down beer is with us!
Corporate American is betting hard tonight that Trump is the death throes of a dying movement and not something here to stay.
One of the sportsball teams is doing much better sportsball than the other sportsball team.
It's almost as if feminism is now completely mainstreamed! https://t.co/rDJL0fDiU0
@KStreetHipster I hope it's the sex kind and not the animal sacrifice kind.
Wait, Anthony Hopkins is in a Transformers movie?
Seems significant that entirely mercenary profit-driven companies are betting that trolling Trump is a way to attra… https://t.co/WXljRivCt9
Wait, someone bought a Super Bowl commercial to sell water?
Perhaps I should have made clear that this tweet was about the Schuyler Sisters. https://t.co/U7WbSewAh6
Bringing out the one living not-horrific Republican is a pretty good Super Bowl subtweet of Trump.
@IamMikeRich that was in response to the Schuyler Sisters.
America was already great.
@Greg651 I'm not anti-law review article. I just think that a lot of effort gets put into a lot of articles that don't accomplish much.
19 mins before kickoff, and I just finished the first draft of a law review article I've been working on for a few months. My life is lit!
Enjoy the Super Bowl. Remember that a touchdown counts for 6 points, unless it is scored by a white guy from Wisconsin. Then it's 9 points.
This guy thinks he should get to put someone on the Supreme Court. https://t.co/Da88I9JfHo

I have not been arrested by anyone in Donald Trump's government.
This tweet will repeat tomorrow if it remains true.
This rally is smaller than @realDonaldTrump's fingers. https://t.co/VIJrZizvRq
Who has the most search-engine optimized page saying when the Super Bowl happens this year?
We need to let the American people have their say. No new justice until the next president is sworn in. https://t.co/lyqxTHaFkx
@Alex_Lily will you post the recording online.
Meanwhile, on Earth 2, President Clinton was briefed on the Fifth Circuit's decision restoring the Labor Department's overtime rule.
But her emails.
You voted for Rex Tillerson. https://t.co/K6xPtEtuVg
This is fine. https://t.co/sEHkBOlgZK
Smart thread. The way to save America is to do whatever you can to undermine Trump's popularity. https://t.co/kSzwYBEorw
The fatal flaw in Trump’s legal defense of his Muslim ban https://t.co/VpsvF4UzFC https://t.co/EKb39xylUS

5) And if the Court doesn't apply Hobby Lobby to Trump, it would give away the game that this is all raw politics.
https://t.co/VaCrYi9HCj

4) I still believe that conclusion in Hobby Lobby was bullshit, but it is the binding command of a SCOTUS opinion.
https://t.co/VaCrYi9HCj

3) But, in Hobby Lobby, SCOTUS said that there is a "complete separation" between 1st Amendment caselaw and RFRA.
https://t.co/VaCrYi9HCj

2) Trump relies on a 1st Amendment case that requires extraordinary deference from courts in some immigration cases
https://t.co/VaCrYi9HCj
1) I read the Trump admin's request for a stay and the fatal flaw in it, IMO, is that it doesn't mention RFRA. https://t.co/VaCrYi9HCj
Yes, although if it is 4-4 it won't be hard for Trump admin to revive case if new justice is confirmed. https://t.co/kCb9c0gFUi
You want to repeal Medicare and replace it with a coupon. https://t.co/xCsvQM1RP8
@chrisgeidner @dominicholden And Hobby Lobby holds that RFRA still applies to religion cases and 1st Ad precedents do not.
@chrisgeidner @dominicholden Interesting. Although the standard applies to First Amendment claims, and the only 1st Ad issue is religion...
@chrisgeidner @dominicholden that's fair, although I have literally never heard the term "facially legitimate" before today.
@rpbp I don't know. Maybe it is a term of art in this context. But it means nothing to me.
@rpbp I'm not sure that I've ever heard that term before.

@jessewegman @ezlusztig I'm quite troubled by it, but I'm troubled because it is an extension of his prior lawlessness.
Never, ever, ever, ever, ever agree to host the Olympics. https://t.co/RIA9lm9GVA
@jessewegman @ezlusztig It is. My point is simply that blanket statements against questioning judicial legitimacy box us in in bad ways.
@jessewegman @ezlusztig If Gorsuch is confirmed, he will be illegitimate. That's Merrick Garland's seat.
@ezlusztig I'm thinking ahead to what I'm going to say when Justice Gorsuch strikes down the entire Clean Air Act.
@jessewegman I'm thinking ahead to what I'm going to say when Justice Gorsuch declares the EPA unconstitutional.
The Supreme Court is likely to be controlled by very bad men for the foreseeable future. We should preserve our rig… https://t.co/5ah8p02TT1
Problem with Trump attacking a judge isn't that he attacked a judge. Some judges are wrong. The problem is Trump's order is evil & illegal.
Yeah, the ship sailed on not having utter political chaos on November 8. https://t.co/65nqqXcht3

@HeerJeet instead of replacing the later with the former.

@HeerJeet “The sobering answer is Yes—the White community is so entitled because for the time being, it is the advanced race.”
@HeerJeet Wait, what did they do this time?
